anime.description: Aesop is a trouble-making young boy who finds himself in another world filled with creatures he has never believed to exist, such as fairies and talking donkeys. He sets off to find a way back to the human world; on his journey, he befriends many characters from well-known fables and encounters many trials, each teaching him a valuable lesson. Source: ANN

externalentity.identifier: まんがイソップ物語_(アニメ映画)
